alert.note: Alert for Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:19PM CDT until July 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LA SALLE...EAST CENTRAL LEE AND SOUTHERN DE KALB COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sheridan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. The strongest winds are moving toward Somonauk, Sandwich, and Hinkley. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sandwich, Sheridan, Shabbona, Lake Holiday, Hinckley, Somonauk, Earlville, Waterman, Serena, Leland, Paw Paw, Millington, Lee, Harding, Prairie Center and Norway. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
